overview:
My name is Michele Orsi, I am the Cloud Software Architect and co-founder of map2app. My role is to take care that all the different parts of the platform works together in a proper way. During the first year I actively developed the server side of map2app, that consists in a set of API used by all the different apps around the platform (such as PlaceGrabber, the User Interface in the browser and the web-services we published for developers).

My previous experience was at European Space Agency for two years in Germany, where I worked on two projects: Service Oriented Architecture framework and Mission Control System life-cycle management. From the first experience I learnt how to structure different pieces of a system in order to be usable by different clients and with different business needs. During the second year I was in touch with different teams that use the software produced by the IT department: it was interesting and useful to see how a software system is used and managed at enterprise level.

I love to spend my free time playing sports: volleyball and beach-volley during the summer and snowboard with my business partner Pietro in winter. All the activities with the body help my mind in relieving from the daily stressful activity; so that each morning I can restart my job from a clean brain!
